PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: PICKFIBER was an international platform of experts on the development, testing and data managing of novel food components based on ecological/organic fibers with specific properties to fight obesity and associated conditions.

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: CABIDDU, R.;CABIDDU, RAMONA;CABIDU, R;CABIDU, R.;Cabiddu, R.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: PSYCHE (Personalised monitoring SYstems for Care in mental HEalth) project developed a personal, cost-effective, multi-parametric monitoring system based on textile platforms and portable sensing devices for the long term and short term acquisition of data from selected class of patients affected by mood disorders.

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: CABIDDU, R.;CABIDDU, RAMONA;CABIDU, R;CABIDU, R.;Cabiddu, R.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: The cardioRisk project addresses the coronary artery disease (CAD) and, specifically, the management of myocardial infarction (MI) patients. The main scientific goal is the development of personalized clinical models for cardiovascular (CV) risk assessment of acute events (e.g. death and myocardial infarction), in order to stratify patients according to their care needs.

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: CABIDDU, R.;CABIDDU, RAMONA;CABIDU, R;CABIDU, R.;Cabiddu, R.

PROJETO-DE-PESQUISA.DESCRICAO-DO-PROJETO: HeartCycle provided a closed-loop disease management solution being able to serve both Heart Failure (HF) patients and Coronary Heart Disease (CHD) patients, including possible co-morbidities hypertension, diabetes and arrhythmias. This was achieved by multi-parametric monitoring and analysis of vital signs and other measurements.

INTEGRANTES-DO-PROJETO.NOME-PARA-CITACAO: CABIDDU, R.;CABIDDU, RAMONA;CABIDU, R;CABIDU, R.;Cabiddu, R.
